title: Create cute aesthetic notes and to-do list application

requirements.text: Create a notes management system that allows users to create, read, update, and delete notes with title and content fields
acceptanceCriteria: Users can create new notes with title and content
Users can view a list of all their notes

requirements.text: Create a to-do list system that allows users to add tasks with checkboxes to mark completion status
acceptanceCriteria: Users can add new to-do items
Each to-do item has a checkbox to mark as complete/incomplete
Completed tasks are visually distinguished from incomplete tasks

requirements.text: Design and implement a cute aesthetic theme with pastel colors, rounded corners, soft shadows, playful typography, and adorable UI elements throughout the entire application
acceptanceCriteria: Color palette uses soft pastel colors (pinks, lavenders, mint greens, peaches)
UI components feature rounded corners and soft shadows
Buttons and interactive elements have cute hover effects
Overall design feels cohesive and adorable
Icons and visual elements match the cute aesthetic

requirements.text: Render generated decorative images as static assets in frontend/public/assets/generated for the cute aesthetic theme
acceptanceCriteria: Generated images are placed in frontend/public/assets/generated
Images are referenced correctly in components
Images load properly and enhance the cute aesthetic

constraints: Use React with TypeScript for frontend
Use Motoko for backend with single-actor architecture
Do not modify immutable frontend paths (useInternetIdentity hooks, useActor, main.tsx, components/ui)
nonGoals: Rich text editing or markdown support

required: Cute kawaii cloud illustration with a smiling face in soft pastel colors (cloud-icon.dim_128x128.png)
Adorable star icon with sparkles in pastel yellow and pink (star-icon.dim_96x96.png)
Playful checkmark icon in cute style with rounded edges (check-icon.dim_64x64.png)
